name: Anti-Reality
description:
Are you ready to enter the Anti-Reality?

As an intern of SafeReality S.A, you have been tasked with going into the woods to hunt the Anti-Being. To do this, you will have different tools at your disposal to locate the beast and then eliminate it.

Are you sure you can earn your minimum wage?

YOUR TOOLS:

To find the Anti-Being, SafeReality S.A. has given you several tools:

  • A divination ball, which will show you an object in the area where the Anti-Being is located.
  • A pendulum, which will look in the direction of the beast.
  • A pill, which will transport you to a limited area of the Anti-Reality, so use it when you think you are close to the monster.

CREDITS:

  • Javier Pérez -> 3D Art and Animation
  • Celtia Martín -> Programming & 2D Art
